text: is a Japanese manga artist. He won the 1988 Shogakukan Manga Award for shōnen for his Just Meet and Fuyu Monogatari. == Works == * * * Free Kick! * * * * * * * * * ==Link== == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Manga artists Category:People from Akashi, Hyōgo
